Articles.Content:
Been lurking around for a bit. I thought I saw a mod mentioned recently that allows you to place a craft in space that otherwise would not be able to fly. As in very large ships made for looks. Please give me the name of this mod if it does indeed exist.

Thanks!
orbital construction is the mod you want it can be found on the Space Dock.
Ah, thank you. Hpyeredit seems to be exactly what I was looking for!
